text: Amadou Soumahoro (31 October 1953 – 7 May 2022) was an Ivorian politician. He was in the National Assembly constituency of Séguéla from 2011 until his death and was President of the National Assembly from 7 March 2019 until his death. He also the President of the Assemblée parlementaire de la Francophonie from 9 July 2019 until his death. Soumahoro was born in Séguéla, Ivory Coast. Soumahoro died on 7 May 2022 in Abidjan, Ivory Coast at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ivorian politicians
title: Amadou Soumahoro
